item.title: Track 1: Emotion Intelligence
item.description: Challenge Tasks Task 1: Emotional Trajectory Detection Task - Accurately identify and concisely summarize users’ emotional changes throughout multi-turn conversations. Task 2: Emotional Reasoning Task - Evaluate whether models can synthesize all conversation information to provide profound explanations. Task 3: Empathy Assessment Task - Assess textual and audio empathy as well as naturalness. The final ranking will be determined based on the total score of all three tasks. The specific weight allocation will be announced in subsequent stages.
